meanings.definition: Relating to or used with both ears.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the binaural music playing in her headphones.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended binaural hearing aids for better sound perception.
meanings.sent3: The binaural headphones made it seem like the music was dancing around her head.
meanings.sent4: His binaural hearing was like having a surround sound system in his ears.
meanings.sent5: The binaural effect made the movie sound like it was happening all around her.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to both ears.

meanings.definition: A recording technique that uses two microphones to create a 3D stereo sound.

meanings.sent2: The binaural technique made the music sound like it was coming from all directions.
meanings.sent3: The binaural setup looked like a pair of friendly robot ears.
meanings.sent4: Listening to the binaural recording was like being transported to the concert venue.
meanings.sent5: The binaural technology allowed for a truly immersive audio experience.
